definition: outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Fold the thoughts and wiping open touch in canthus under that bit of tears.
sentences.chinese: 收起思绪，拭开沾在眼角下的那点泪花。

sentences.english: I was sitting in my office and saw it out of the corner of my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我正坐在办公室里，c从眼角余光发现了它。

sentences.english: Eyes slowly begin to shut, the canthus slides elapse a drop of radiant tears.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛慢慢的闭起，眼角滑过一滴晶莹的泪。

sentences.english: Out of the corner of my eye, I saw a baby playing with rattles on my mother’s bed.
sentences.chinese: 我眼角余光看到一个小孩在妈妈的床上玩拨浪鼓。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I caught sight of the Valentine flowers which was a bouquet of roses and carnations given by my husband.
sentences.chinese: 我从眼角瞥见了那由玫瑰和康乃馨组成的情人节花束。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprelisting; helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼睑从眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹开，帮手提拔肌肤。

sentences.english: Remove eye wrinkles, there is a way to massage the whole face.
sentences.chinese: 除去眼角皱纹的方法还有一种是全脸按摩。

sentences.english: A close-up shot of the actress reveals wrinkles round her eyes and a sign of fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 特写镜头露出了女演员眼角的皱纹，她略显疲惫。

sentences.english: She is beginning to get winkles around her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她眼角开始出现皱纹了。

sentences.english: She's beginning to get wrinkles round her eyes.
From the corner of his eyes, Jack saw a flash outside the window. Hensley saw it, too.
sentences.chinese: 杰克眼角的余光瞥到窗外有道闪光，汉斯莱也看见了。

sentences.english: The upper minimizing eyelids from the corner of the eye to eye end oblique upper direction sprepost: helps improve skin.
sentences.chinese: 高低眼睑从眼角至眼尾斜上方向抹开，辅助提拔肌肤。

sentences.english: You sit there watching me in secret through the corner of your prying eyes.
sentences.chinese: 你坐在一旁偷偷地从侦伺的眼角看着我。

sentences.english: She stared at him, her mascara smeared, tears upon her cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 她凝望着他，睫毛膏模糊在眼角，脸颊上有泪。

sentences.english: The corner of the eye spills over the evasive tear up.
sentences.chinese: 眼角溢炪点点閁烁悳汨洸。

sentences.english: The biosynthetic cornea is made from laboratory-constructed human collagen.
sentences.chinese: 人工眼角膜是以“重组人胶原蛋白”为原料做成的。

definition: outer tip of the eyebrow/(facial) expression/(Tw) knack/trick of the trade
(out of) the corner of one's eyes/peripheral vision/residual light/light of the setting sun
